summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2386 for the improvement of Twentieth Avenue Northeast, from East Fiftieth Street to East Fifty-eighth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, by constructing wooden crosswalks, curbs and gutters; and by providing for the necessary surface and sub-drainage; under Ordinance No. 24846, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
